title: La Casa Italian Grill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian food and pizza. While menu is meat-based, the kitchen keeps on hand Daiya vegan cheese. Vegans could ask for vegan cheese on pizza, bruschetta appetizer, arugula salad with tomato and pecans, or the spaghetti squash in a chipotle marinara with grilled asparagus and broccoli. Prices are moderate at lunch and slightly more at dinner.
